getLocalPart

public static java.lang.String getLocalPart(java.lang.String qname)
Returns the local part of the given raw qname.

Parameters:
qname - raw qname input
Returns:
Local part of the name if prefixed, or the given name if not

getPrefixPart

public static java.lang.String getPrefixPart(java.lang.String qname)
Returns the prefix part of the given raw qname.

Parameters:
qname - raw qname input
Returns:
Prefix of name or empty string if none there

getQualifiedName

public static final java.lang.String getQualifiedName(java.lang.String localName,
                                                      java.lang.String pfx)
Returns qualified name as String

QName ::= PrefixedName | UnprefixedName
PrefixedName ::= Prefix ':' LocalPart
UnprefixedName ::= LocalPart

Returns:
String for qname

getClassName

public static java.lang.String getClassName(javax.xml.namespace.QName qname)
Returns the className for a given qname e.g., {http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema}decimal --> org.w3.2001.XMLSchema.decimal

Parameters:
qname -
Returns:
className or null if converting is not possible
